text: Michał Marusik (26 September 1951 — 18 December 2020) was a Polish politician. He was leader of the Congress of the New Right (KNP) from 2015 to 2017. He was a Member of the European Parliament representing Warsaw from 2014 to 2019. Marusik was born in Skrzynki, Poland. Marusik died on 18 December 2020 in Warsaw at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:MEPs for Poland
title: Michał Marusik
